description: T.900 Purple Beech - 2m Lateral reduction of scaffold limbs to suitable growth points.T.904 Cherry - Fell.T.906 Larch - Reduce height of main stem by 5m to suitable growth points.T.907 Sweet Chestnut - Crown lift to 2.5m from ground level over footpath & deadwood.T.909 Crab Apple - 3m Crown reshape.T.911 Wild Cherry - Fell.T.912 Crab Apple - 3m Crown reshape.T.915 Lawson Cypress - Fell.T.921-923 Lawson Cypress - Trim to shape.T.924 Silver Lime - 3m Holsitic crown reduction, 10% crown thin & deadwood.(other listed works exempt from application)
